common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this API to get Product level ads single-day hourly performance.

error_list.name: ads.shop.campaign_not_match
error_list.description: Invalid campaign ID for this shop.

error_list.name: error_not_found
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: ads.api.http_method_not_allowed
error_list.description: Only the supported HTTP method for the API is allowed.

error_list.name: ads.performance.error_date_in_future
error_list.description: The date must be today or earlier than today up to 6 months ago.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_partner_api
error_list.description: Too many requests, please reduce the request rate and try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_shop_api
error_list.description: Too many requests for the shop at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: ads.rate_limit.exceed_api
error_list.description: Too many requests at the moment, please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

This is the parameter to indicate the start date of the time length of performance.

","name":"performance_date","sample":"17-07-2024","type":"string","required":"True","key":"eScyMwQ"},{"description":"

The campaign ids (comma separated) you want to fetch the performance. (max 100)

","name":"campaign_id_list","sample":"11111,22222","type":"string","required":"True","key":"PBmjCij"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Error code, empty when no error returned

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kCNJaT"},{"description":"

error description

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jQDFMje"},{"description":"

If some data cannot respond normally, set the warning

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NQbhnk"},{"description":"

request id is unique for each request

","name":"request_id","sample":"6f235f4a343e4feb8a9ed74c439f6663","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ebfErh"},{"description":"

response body

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"rrhktKH","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a shop

","name":"shop_id","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"WsBNfmw"},{"description":"

The region where this Shop is under

","name":"region","sample":"SG","type":"string","required":null,"key":"hiXQPia"},{"description":"

the list of campaign

","name":"campaign_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"pHMaKty","children":[{"description":"

The unique identifier for a campaign

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"12121","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TxxhYGP"},{"description":"

auto, manual

","name":"ad_type","sample":"auto","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bBiZSHi"},{"description":"

search, discovery, all

","name":"campaign_placement","sample":"search","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ZJWRmQs"},{"description":"

the name of each campaign

","name":"ad_name","sample":"name","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bDnnNGr"},{"description":"

performance metric list

","name":"metrics_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"FdeiBXk","children":[{"description":"

This is the parameter to indicate each hour the performance record belongs to.

","name":"hour","sample":"14","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"fpwByHp"},{"description":"

This is the parameter of the single date on which requestor wants to check the hourly performance

","name":"date","sample":"12-12-2023","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YGaKTe"},{"description":"

The number of times shoppers see your ad.

","name":"impression","sample":"111","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"aBRwTj"},{"description":"

The number of times shoppers click on your ad. (Note: Shopee filters out repeated clicks from the same shopper that occur within a short time frame.)

","name":"clicks","sample":"222","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"iRdBRWc"},{"description":"

The click-through rate (CTR) measures how often shoppers end up clicking on your ad after seeing it. It is the number of clicks on your ad divided by the number of times your ad is seen. CTR = clicks ÷ impressions × 100%.

","name":"ctr","sample":"12.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"cNdfPeK"},{"description":"

The amount spent on your ad.

","name":"expense","sample":"11.22","type":"float","required":null,"key":"yTKEawm"},{"description":"

The amount of sales revenue generated from shoppers purchasing products within 7 days of them clicking on your ad.

","name":"broad_gmv","sample":"1.2","type":"float","required":null,"key":"bmtdpYG"},{"description":"

The number of times shoppers purchased any product from your shop within 7 days of them clicking on your ad.

","name":"broad_order","sample":"100","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"fyHKkwi"},{"description":"

The total quantity of products purchased by shoppers within 7 days of them clicking on your ad.

","name":"broad_order_amount","sample":"200","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TQHJjne"},{"description":"

Return on ad spend (ROAS) measures how much revenue is generated by your ad relative to the cost of the ad. It is the amount of sales revenue attributed to your ad divided by the amount spent on the ad. ROAS = GMV ÷ expense. (Note: We recommend monitoring ROAS trends on a weekly basis.)

","name":"broad_roi","sample":"2.3","type":"float","required":null,"key":"ZhTBdhX"},{"description":"

The advertising cost of sales (ACOS) measures how much your ad costs relative to the revenue the ad generates. It is the amount spent on your ad divided by the amount of sales revenue attributed to the ad. ACOS = expense ÷ GMV × 100%.

","name":"broad_cir","sample":"3.4","type":"float","required":null,"key":"nejBtft"},{"description":"

The conversion rate measures how often shoppers end up purchasing something from your shop after clicking on your ad. It is the number of conversions attributed to your ad divided by the number of clicks on the ad. Conversion rate = conversions ÷ clicks × 100%.

","name":"cr","sample":"4.5","type":"float","required":null,"key":"tsXrRff"},{"description":"

The cost per conversion is how much each conversion costs, on average. It is the amount spent on your ad divided by the number of conversions attributed to the ad. Cost per conversion = expense ÷ conversions.

","name":"cpc","sample":"5.6","type":"float","required":null,"key":"QNsKApE"},{"description":"

The number of times shoppers purchased the advertised product within 7 days of them clicking on the ad.

","name":"direct_order","sample":"999","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"rKnaeTY"},{"description":"

The total quantity of the advertised product purchased by shoppers within 7 days of them clicking on the ad.

","name":"direct_order_amount","sample":"1111","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"BfYNArx"},{"description":"

The amount of sales revenue generated from shoppers purchasing the advertised product within 7 days of them clicking on the ad.

","name":"direct_gmv","sample":"12.23","type":"float","required":null,"key":"hcSNeBS"},{"description":"

The direct return on ad spend, or direct ROAS, measures how much revenue is generated from sales of the advertised product, relative to the cost of the ad. It is the amount of sales revenue for the advertised product attributed to the ad, divided by the amount spent on the ad. Direct ROAS = direct GMV ÷ expense.

","name":"direct_roi","sample":"23.34","type":"float","required":null,"key":"wGZHHPk"},{"description":"

The direct advertising cost of sales, or direct ACOS, measures how much your ad costs relative to the revenue generated from sales of the advertised product. It is the amount spent on the ad divided by the amount of sales revenue for the advertised product that is attributed to the ad. Direct ACOS = expense ÷ direct GMV × 100%.

","name":"direct_cir","sample":"34.45","type":"float","required":null,"key":"CbzMcMZ"},{"description":"

The direct conversion rate measures how often shoppers end up purchasing the advertised product after clicking on the ad. Direct conversion rate is the number of direct conversions divided by the number of clicks. Direct conversion rate = direct conversions ÷ clicks × 100%.

","name":"direct_cr","sample":"45.56","type":"float","required":null,"key":"jPRPbAp"},{"description":"

The cost per direct conversion is how much each direct conversion costs, on average. It is the amount spent on your ad divided by the number of direct conversions attributed to the ad. Cost per direct conversion = expense ÷ direct conversions.

","name":"cpdc","sample":"56.67","type":"float","required":null,"key":"MXAMcpi"}]}]}]}]}
